attributes.action: just opening a cannabis shop without any further ado
attributes.additional_details:
The petition is to make the government sign just one letter agreeing to the opening of the cannabis shop of just one man and for the sake of one man’s personal freedom.... i have written to my local MP to announce the opening of the shop ‘Doodles’ without further ado, to invite a Truce, a bypassing of longstanding bureaucratic failure with one signature. The idea is to go by the way of law and of one person’s individual rights to employment and Religion, that one person's right to open a shop is the correct endorsement, what the change of law looks like in practice. The gist of the argument is contained in a letter to local MP Jamie Reed. This can be discovered on my blog. As can the Petition details.

http://johnfbtuckersblog.blogspot.co.uk/

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be used to raise personal issues.  There are already e-petitions covering the subject of cannabis use.
